
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/ruoli-0/p/18947490" title="发布于 2025-07-24 17:05">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">【机器人】—— 2. ROS 集成开发环境配置</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<blockquote>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　和大多数开发环境一样，理论上，在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 中，只需要记事本就可以编写基本的 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 程序，但是工欲善其事必先利其器，为了提高开发效率，可以先安装集成开发工具和使用方便的工具：终端、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">IDE</span>....</span></p>
</blockquote>
<h1 id="141-安装终端"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">1.安装终端：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Terminator</span></span></h1>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(0, 204, 255, 1)"><strong>在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 中，需要频繁的使用到终端，且可能需要同时开启多个窗口，推荐一款较为好用的终端：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Terminator</span>。</strong></span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　效果如下：</span></p>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250625100358522-849614783.jpg" alt="" width="628" height="417" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.1</span> 安装</span></h2>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> apt <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> terminator</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.2</span> 添加到收藏夹</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　显示应用程序 ---&gt; 搜索 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">terminator</span> ---&gt; 右击 选择 添加到收藏夹</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.3</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Terminator</span> 常用快捷键</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在同一个标签内的操作：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>Alt+Up                          <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到上面的终端</span>
Alt+Down                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到下面的终端</span>
Alt+Left                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到左边的终端</span>
Alt+Right                       <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到右边的终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+O                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">水平分割终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+E                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">垂直分割终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Right                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">在垂直分割的终端中将分割条向右移动</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Left                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">在垂直分割的终端中将分割条向左移动</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Up                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">在水平分割的终端中将分割条向上移动</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Down                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">在水平分割的终端中将分割条向下移动</span>
Ctrl+Shift+S                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">隐藏/显示滚动条</span>
Ctrl+Shift+F                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">搜索</span>
Ctrl+Shift+C                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">复制选中的内容到剪贴板</span>
Ctrl+Shift+V                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">粘贴剪贴板的内容到此处</span>
Ctrl+Shift+W                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">关闭当前终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Q                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">退出当前窗口，当前窗口的所有终端都将被关闭</span>
Ctrl+Shift+X                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">最大化显示当前终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+Z                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">最大化显示当前终端并使字体放大</span>
Ctrl+Shift+N or Ctrl+Tab        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到下一个终端</span>
Ctrl+Shift+P or Ctrl+Shift+Tab  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">Crtl+Shift+Tab 移动到之前的一个终端</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在不同标签之间的操作：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>F11                             <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">全屏开关</span>
Ctrl+Shift+T                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">打开一个新的标签</span>
Ctrl+PageDown                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到下一个标签</span>
Ctrl+PageUp                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">移动到上一个标签</span>
Ctrl+Shift+PageDown             <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">将当前标签与其后一个标签交换位置</span>
Ctrl+Shift+PageUp               <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">将当前标签与其前一个标签交换位置</span>
Ctrl+Plus (+)                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">增大字体</span>
Ctrl+Minus (-)                  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">减小字体</span>
Ctrl+Zero (<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span>)                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">恢复字体到原始大小</span>
Ctrl+Shift+R                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">重置终端状态</span>
Ctrl+Shift+G                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">重置终端状态并clear屏幕</span>
Super+g                         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">绑定所有的终端，以便向一个输入能够输入到所有的终端</span>
Super+Shift+G                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">解除绑定</span>
Super+t                         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">绑定当前标签的所有终端，向一个终端输入的内容会自动输入到其他终端</span>
Super+Shift+T                   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">解除绑定</span>
Ctrl+Shift+I                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">打开一个窗口，新窗口与原来的窗口使用同一个进程</span>
Super+i                         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">打开一个新窗口，新窗口与原来的窗口使用不同的进程</span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1 id="142-安装vscode"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.</span>安装：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VS&nbsp; Code</span></span></h1>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VS Code</span> 全称 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Visual Studio Code</span>，是微软出的一款轻量级代码编辑器，免费、开源而且功能强大。它支持几乎所有主流的程序语言的语法高亮、智能代码补全、自定义热键、括号匹配、代码片段、代码对比 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Diff</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">GIT</span> 等特性，支持插件扩展，并针对网页开发和云端应用开发做了优化。软件跨平台支持 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Win</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Mac</span> 以及 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Linux</span>。</span></p>
<h2 id="1下载"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.1</span> 下载</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　VScode 下载：<a href="https://code.visualstudio.com/docs?start=true" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://code.visualstudio.com/docs?start=true</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　历史版本下载链接：<a href="https://code.visualstudio.com/updates" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://code.visualstudio.com/updates</a></span></p>
<h4>&nbsp;</h4>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.2</span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VS Code</span> 安装与卸载</span></h2>
<h3 id="21-安装"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.2.1</span> 安装</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　方式<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1</span>：双击安装即可(或右击选择安装)</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　方式<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> dpkg -i xxxx.deb</span>&nbsp;<code><br></code></span></p>
<h3 id="22-卸载"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.2.2</span> 卸载</span></h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> dpkg --purge  code</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.3</span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VS Code</span> 集成 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 插件</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VS Code</span> 开发 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 程序，需要先安装一些插件，常用插件如下:</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202507/2123988-20250724153202984-1905686708.jpg" alt="" width="678" height="151" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202507/2123988-20250724153539238-1826505027.jpg" alt="" width="679" height="190" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202507/2123988-20250724153651049-927024267.jpg" alt="" width="680" height="209" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202507/2123988-20250724153451285-1887324816.png" alt="" width="681" height="125" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">vscode</span> 使用_基本配置</span></h2>
<h3 id="41-创建-ros-工作空间"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.1</span> 创建 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 工作空间</span></h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">mkdir</span> -p xxx_ws/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">src    # (必须得有 src)

cd xxx_ws

catkin_make</span></pre>
</div>
<h3 id="42-启动-vscode"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.2</span> 启动 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">vscode</span></span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 14pt">　　<span style="font-size: 18px">进入 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">xxx_ws&nbsp;<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">目录</span></span>，启动 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">vscode<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">：</span></span></span></span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">cd xxx_ws

code .</span></pre>
</div>
<h3 id="43-vscode-中编译-ros"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.3</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">vscode</span> 中编译 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ros</span></span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　快捷键 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ctrl + shift + B </span>调用编译，选择：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">catkin_make:build<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">。</span></span></span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">可以点击配置设置为默认，修改&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">.vscode/tasks.json</span>&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">文件：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">{
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 有关 tasks.json 格式的文档，请参见
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1); text-decoration: underline">https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=733558</span>
    "version": "2.0.0"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>"tasks"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
        {
            </span>"label": "catkin_make:debug", <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">代表提示的描述性信息</span>
            "type": "shell",  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">可以选择shell或者process,如果是shell代码是在shell里面运行一个命令，如果是process代表作为一个进程来运行</span>
            "command": "catkin_make",<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">这个是我们需要运行的命令</span>
            "args": [],<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">如果需要在命令后面加一些后缀，可以写在这里，比如-DCATKIN_WHITELIST_PACKAGES=“pac1;pac2”</span>
            "group": {"kind":"build","isDefault":<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
            </span>"presentation"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: {
                </span>"reveal": "always"<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">可选always或者silence，代表是否输出信息</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            },
            </span>"problemMatcher": "$msCompile"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
        }
    ]
}</span></pre>
</div>
<h3 id="44-创建-ros-功能包"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.4</span> 创建 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 功能包</span></h3>
<p style="text-align: left"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　右键点击&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">src</span>&nbsp;目录&nbsp;---&gt;&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">create catkin <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">package</span></span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times"><br></span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　设置包名、添加依赖：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　☂&nbsp;第一个框（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">package name</span>）：填写功能包名称，自定义</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　☂&nbsp;第二个框（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">dependencies</span>）：填写用到的功能包名称&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">roscpp rospy std_msgs</span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<h3><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.5</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 实现</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在自定义的功能包的 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">src</span>&nbsp;目录下新建 xxxx.<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">cpp</span> 文件：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">
    控制台输出 HelloVSCode !!!
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
#include </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ros/ros.h</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> main(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> argc, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> *<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">argv[])
{
    setlocale(LC_ALL,</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">""</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">执行节点初始化</span>
    ros::init(argc,argv,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">HelloVSCode</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);

    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">输出日志</span>
    ROS_INFO(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Hello VSCode!!!哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
}</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">　　PS1</span>: 如果没有代码提示，</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">修改&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">.vscode/c_cpp_properties.json</span>&nbsp;，</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">设置&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">"cppStandard": "c++17"</span>&nbsp;。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">　　PS2</span>: <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">main</span> 函数的参数不可以被 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">const</span> 修饰</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">　　PS3</span>: 当 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS__INFO</span> 终端输出有中文时，会出现乱码</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　解决办法：在函数开头加入下面代码的任意一句</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>setlocale(LC_CTYPE, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">zh_CN.utf8</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
setlocale(LC_ALL, </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">""</span>);</pre>
</div>
<h3 id="46-python-实现"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.6</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python</span> 实现</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在自定义的功能包下新建 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">scripts</span> 文件夹，创建&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python</span> 文件，并添加可执行权限：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">! /usr/bin/env python</span>
<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">
    Python 版本的 HelloVScode，执行在控制台输出 HelloVScode
    实现:
    1.导包
    2.初始化 ROS 节点
    3.日志输出 HelloWorld
</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">import</span> rospy <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 1.导包</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">__name__</span> == <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">__main__</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:

    rospy.init_node(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Hello_Vscode_p</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>)  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 2.初始化 ROS 节点</span>
    rospy.loginfo(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Hello VScode, 我是 Python ....</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>)  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">3.日志输出 HelloWorld</span></pre>
</div>
<h3 id="47-配置-cmakeliststxt"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.7</span> 配置 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">CMakeLists.txt</span></span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 配置:</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">add_executable(节点名称（自定义）
  src</span>/C++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">源文件名.cpp
)
target_link_libraries(节点名称（同上一致）
  ${catkin_LIBRARIES}
)</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python</span> 配置:</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>catkin_install_python(PROGRAMS scripts/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">自定义文件名.py
  DESTINATION ${CATKIN_PACKAGE_BIN_DESTINATION}
)</span></pre>
</div>
<h3 id="48-编译执行"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.8</span> 编译执行</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　编译: <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ctrl + shift + B</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　执行 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span>:</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VScode</span> 中添加</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　终端<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1</span>，执行：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">source ./devel/setup.bash</span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　终端<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>，执行：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">rosrun 功能包名称 文件名</span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　执行 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python</span>:在&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VScode&nbsp;</span>中添加</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　终端1，执行：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">roscore&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　终端2，执行：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">source ./devel/setup.bash&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　终端3，执行：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">rosrun 功能包名称 文件名</span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">PS</span>:&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">如果不编译直接执行 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python</span> 文件，会抛出异常。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　1.第一行解释器声明，可以使用绝对路径定位到 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python3</span> 的安装路径&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code"><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">! /usr/bin/python3</span></span>&nbsp;，但是不建议</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　2.建议使用&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code"><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">!/usr/bin/env python</span></span>&nbsp;，但是会抛出异常：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">/usr/bin/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">env</span>: “python”: 没有那个文件或目录</span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times"><br></span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　3.解决1：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code"><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">!/usr/bin/env python3</span></span>&nbsp;，直接使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python3</span>，但不兼容之前的 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 相关 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python</span> 实现</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　4.解决2: 创建一个链接符号到 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">python</span> 命令：&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">ln</span> -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python</span>&nbsp;<code><br></code></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.5</span> 其他 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">IDE</span></span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 开发可以使用的 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">IDE</span> 还是比较多的，除了上述的 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VScode</span>，还有 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Eclipse</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">QT</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">PyCharm</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Roboware</span> ...,详情可以参考官网介绍：<a href="http://wiki.ros.org/IDEs" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">IDEs</a>。<br></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h1 id="143-launch文件演示"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch</span> 文件演示</span></h1>
<h2 id="1需求"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.1</span> 需求</span></h2>
<blockquote>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　一个程序中可能需要启动多个节点，比如：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 内置的小乌龟案例，如果要控制乌龟运动，要启动多个窗口，分别启动 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">roscore</span>、乌龟界面节点、键盘控制节点。如果每次都调用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rosrun</span> 逐一启动，显然效率低下，如何优化?</span></p>

















</blockquote>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="font-size: 14pt">官方给出的优化策略是使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch</span> 文件，可以一次性启动多个 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 节点。</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-size: 14pt">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch&nbsp;</span>文件会默认首先启动 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">roscore</span>。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.2<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span>实现</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　① 选定功能包右击 ---&gt; 添加 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch</span> 文件夹</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　② 选定 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch</span> 文件夹，右击 ---&gt; 添加 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">XXX.launch</span> 文件</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　③ 编辑 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">launch</span> 文件内容：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">launch</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">node </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">pkg</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="helloworld"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="demo_hello"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="hello"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> output</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="screen"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">node </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">pkg</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="turtlesim"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="turtlesim_node"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="t1"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">node </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">pkg</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="turtlesim"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="turtle_teleop_key"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key1"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">launch</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　★&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">node</span>&nbsp;：包含的某个节点</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✄&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">pkg</span>&nbsp;：功能包</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✄&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">type</span>&nbsp;：被运行的节点文件</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✄&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">name <span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">：</span></span>为节点命名</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✄&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">output&nbsp;</span>：设置日志的输出目标</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　④&nbsp;运行 launch 文件</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>source ./devel/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">setup.bash

roslaunch 包名 launch文件名</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　运行结果: 一次性启动了多个节点。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
